lead_paragraph: Barcelona lost to Valencia, 2-1, and found itself tied on points atop the Spanish league after a victory by Atlético Madrid.

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Opens Door for Its Rivals
headline.main: Barcelona Opens Door for Its Rivals

abstract: Soccer Roundup; Valencia defeats Barcelona, 2-1; other soccer scores noted.
